["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","h3",null,{"id":"pmbootstrap","children":"pmbootstrap"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["通过 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"pmbootstrap config"}]," 更新镜像配置。"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"pmbootstrap config mirrors.alpine {{http_protocol}}{{host}}/alpine/
pmbootstrap config mirrors.pmaports {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/
pmbootstrap config mirrors.systemd {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/extra-repos/systemd/","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["其中 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"mirrors.alpine"}]," 部分也可前往 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/alpine/","children":"Alpine 帮助"}]," 选择其他的镜像站。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"移除镜像配置","children":"移除镜像配置"}],"
",["$r","SyntaxHighlight",null,{"code":"pmbootstrap config -r mirrors.alpine
pmbootstrap config -r mirrors.pmaports
pmbootstrap config -r mirrors.systemd","language":"bash"}]]}]

meta.title: postmarketOS 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
